text: Kaje kusakala yasagwile pakusumanya ni (ntendele wa) mitima jao, kwakuli kanila kwao yatulwisye Allah ligongo lya litima lyanti Allah antuluchisye ukoto Wakwe jwansachile mwa achikapolo Wakwe (jwanganawa Myuda), basi ni awajilwe kupata gasabu pachanya pa gasabu (jakala). Soni akwete kupata achimakafili ilagasyo yakwalusya
